name: Pong V2
description:
Pong V2.0

Here is a game I made with Lua and Love2D.  It is my first game!  It is a simple version of the awesome game Pong.  It is Version 2 because I had to re-write it to remove about 100 bugs*

CHANGE LOG -  is HERE

Features:

- Swap Colors!

One Player Features

- Up and Down Arrows Also Work for P1

- Player 2 is a Robot (IMPOSSIBLE TO BEAT**)

Two Player Features

- Easy Scoring System

- Infinite Points!

Android Support is coming soon!  Android Support Progress: 4% 

Keys

W  - Player 1 Up

S - Player 1 Down

UP Arrow - Player 2 Up

DOWN Arrow - Player 2 Down

C - Swap Colors

T - Toggle if Player 2 is CPU or Real

R - Reset Ball

X - Reset Match (and Scores)

B  - Bounds Mode***

Sorry Linux Users, but you may have to buy the SRC to play.

Notes

This game was made in about 2 days...

*Maybe not that many. **There was no other way.  ***Never Get Out!
